name: Peeka T.
text: This store looked great! My sis and I had a great time walking around looking at all the treasures that Home Goods has to offer. Its literally a treasure hunt. To the untrained eye, some items may look like they are priced averagely, but to those of us that understand quality, this is where we go first before heading out to over priced department stores. One could browse this store for hours. The employees do a great job keeping this Home Goods location organized. There are plenty of good finds for all ages.

name: Brittany Greer
text: Such cute things, organized, and very clean. It's impressive they're able to keep so much so well organized when similar stores can't seem to keep a single shelf straight. Always a positive experience.

name: Elisha-Hope Weaver
text:
The locations observes Covid safety measures.

Location currently has a good select of inventory. Staff seems to replenish inventory as it becomes available. *Friendly suggestion* if you see something you like, BUY IT THEN! (Most inventory doesn't last long and is RARELY duplicated)

Location is neat and orderly, however navigation in the aisles can become congested if directional floor signage not observed.

Staff is friendly, helpful and professional.

Overall, it was a pleasant shopping experience.

name: Laura Grayson
text: Just came to see the new store that was added. They have some great finds. Wasn’t really looking for anything today but I’m being tempted to buy. It’s pulling me in. 😬😬😬

name: K S
text: I love this store, it's full of really great products, for a super great prices.

name: Linda Glover
text: I adore HomeGoods this is a good one, well-organized and tidy

name: Callie Rhodes Outlaw
text: Good selection and prices.

name: Brandon Pritts
text: Always great deals! Clean and organized!

name: Phyllis Spates
text: Prices higher than I expected.So I walked 2 doors down to Ross who had many of the same items for half the price.Good things come to those who wait.

name: Virle Owens
text: This place is awesome. I could literally redecorated my whole house from this store. The help is wonderful also.

name: Rhonda Baccus
text: Great stuff just a little high

name: Chanel Rubio
text: Very clean and organized.  I love their clearance isles too.

name: Lashanda Banks
text: Well stocked and great service

name: LaShawn Wright
text: HomeGoods is great for giving the perfect gift or even shopping for yourself, they have all types of beautiful items ,You definitely won't go wrong 😁

name: RTS
text: You definitely can find beautiful home decor here. Isles are tight.

name: Debbie White
text: My favorite place to shop for anything for my home or patio!

name: Tom Shelton
text: Very nice store

name: Sharon McShan Harris
text: Really good

name: Joanne Romanek
text: Expensive

name: Sherry Ann Weller
text: Lots of pretty stuff

name: Ashley “AAHST” Trawick
text: My pups are thrilled with a couple of toys that didn't make my heart break when I looked at the price tag!

name: Bama Jayne
text: Great place to shop! Amazing inventory....

name: Danielle Schroeder
text: Delicious food and wonderful staff

name: Robin Peed
text: Didn't hardly have anything.

name: Dianna Lantz
text: I Love It!

name: Victory Reliable Services, LLC
text: Grand Opening Friday March 29

name: Austin D.
text: Obviously a front for laundering money.

name: Kayla Tillman
text: I've been shopping for a couple new mattress sets trying to find the best deal. Went to several places and was about to give up and just break the bank, until I saw Alabama Overstock in Hartselle. Chris Moore, the owner helped me find the right mattress to fit my preferences. The money spent was a fraction of the other stores I went to. They carried the cooling bamboo pillows, cooling mattress protector, and sheet sets. Highly recommend them for your home furnishings and mattress needs!

name: Teri Watson
text: Great mattress store! Go see Chris Moore!

name: Cheri Sellers
text: We LOVE Alabama Overstock!!! They are very friendly and helpful and have great quality furniture and mattresses! We’ve bought a mattress and box springs, a master bedroom suite and bedroom furniture and mattress for our teenage son! Can’t beat their prices  for the quality anywhere!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you enjoy your bedroom group for years to come.

name: chris pike
text:
Great products, prices and service.
If you need furniture or mattress go by and see them. It will be well worth your time.

name: Anthony Bradford
text: If you are in need of furniture this is the place to go. Chris and his staff are awesome and very knowledgeable of the products they sale. Easy to work with on purchases.

resp.text: Thank you and we appreciate your business.

name: Demaris Johnson
text: Very nice people to buy from

name: Anna Boger
text: I’ve bought several mattress here always great quality and great service!

resp.text: Thank you for your business and we hope you are still enjoying your mattresses. Call us anytime if we can ever be of service to you.

name: Terrika Gibson
text: The job is pretty laid back. The work is easy. They do give out uniforms. And there is no required dress code as long as it's neat n professional.

name: Lucky Luke
text:
I got unloaded in less then 10 min
Forklifters are extremely fast, super organized 👍

name: D. Jackson
text: The General Manager is very obnoxious and rude he also has terrible people skills, William Sopp

name: Nancy Gardner
text: We love these sheets! They feel like “home” to us. They remind us of an old quilt. They have the heft and substantial feel of fabric like grandma’s sheets from the way way back machine. The feel is vintage and luxurious at the same time.  They aren’t the silky 1000 thread count Egyptian cotton sheets like you might have in a 5-star hotel, and that’s really okay with us.

name: Tammy Miller
text: Loved the Sheets so beautiful and comfortable. We received from our Daddy for Christmas. These are NOT your ordinary sheets folks they are worth every penny!!

name: Heather Lane
text: So sad to hear the reviews after washing the sheets. I thought the bath sheets were rough too after washing. For the price I will stick to my Costco deals. I am giving 3 stars because I LOVE THE QUILT!!! It is awesome of course it has only been washed once…I will be back in a few months for an update. We need BETTER COTTON IN USA!!!!! GMO Sucks and I think these are non gmo…so maybe it is the plants in general??

name: Maureen Pfaff
text: I saw an ad for Red Land Cotton on Facebook and was on the fence about placing an order as I've had bad experiences with other companies I've ordered from through FB but if you are looking for high quality products that are made in the USA DO NOT HESITATE!  I ordered sheets, a blanket and the Wiley night shirt and everything arrived, beautifully packaged and exactly as described.  These are top quality and so comfortable.  I just ordered two more sheet sets and a night shirt to give as a gift.  Thank you Red Land Cotton for keeping these textile jobs here in the USA and offering such great products, keep up the good work!

name: Sheila Ward
text: These sheets are terrible!  Scratchy and pilling after one wash. They look great till you wash them. Funny, they won’t stand behind them after you wash them. I notice now that most of the reviews on the web site are by people before they actually use their sheets.

name: Melissa Lawson
text: I really wanted to support this American company, but I just cannot and feel I have to let others know so they don't waste money on these expensive, poor quality sheets. I purchased the ticking stripe sheet set. I washed in cold water and dried on low. I promptly removed them and put them on the bed. They are extremely rough and have pilled badly. I contacted RLC customer service and they have replaced the fitted sheet twice (I received these in Jan. 2021) and they have done the same thing. RLC refuses to allow me to return them for a refund. Very poor quality. I am willing to pay a premium price for quality sheets. Unfortunately, I can't get them from RLC.

name: Cecelia Noble
text: I recommend the company highly! I bought the basic sheet set after receiving one as a gift. I love the texture. I wash them often and they get better with each washing.

name: CJ Banks
text: Great product, will only buy these sheets in the future. They make great gifts as well!!

name: william Sipeswi
text:
We spent our first night on our new sheets last night and they were Wonderful. They felt exactly like the all cotton sheets I remember sleeping on as a child..you know, the ones we hung on the line in the warm Mississippi sunshine. And they smelled fresh and clean from being purified by the sun.

My husband who never notices anything new got up this morning and said " order another set of those sheets. That's the bests night's sleep Ive had in years. " We are in Florida now and they are perfect for this climate.
I will be ordering our second set shortly. Thank you for making such an outstanding product. We love that it is made in the USA.

name: Elizabeth Limbaugh
text: I have had a set of the lace trimmed (now discontinued) RLC sheets for several years now and they are the best sheets I have ever had. I now have the ticking stripe bed skirt and baby quilt as well as white fitted sheet for my baby girl’s room. It is classic and an heirloom set that can be used for years to come. I got the sleeveless sleep shirt from one of the seconds sales. It is so nice that I usually only wear it when I’m going out though it is certainly comfortable enough to lounge in and I love that it has pockets. The hand towels are on display in my kitchen. I’m hopeful to get a second set of sheets soon so that I never sleep on anything but Red Land Cotton. The products are high quality, American made, and if you reach out to the company, owners are quick to respond and address any concerns. Haven’t been to the store but hope to go soon.

name: Paul Dwyer
text: Just received our Red Land Cotton simple white sheets for our queen size bed. What I absolutely love is the sizing. There is plenty of sheet to actually tuck in under the mattress. Usually when you buy a set the sheets just barely get under the mattress...if at all. We cannot wait to sleep between these sheets for the first time tonight 😀 Beth in Maine

name: Wanda Blanks
text: I am very pleased with my Red Land Cotton towels. I took them straight out of the box to the washer and used them that night. Unlike some brands, they really absorb the water rather than just moving it around on your skin. And I love that they're made in the USA!

name: Marcee Goff
text: We are unbelievably disappointed in the feel and quality of these Very Expensive sheets. We ordered a King set with extra pillow cases . I thought they felt rough when I open the package and wanted to send them back. My husband convinced me to wash them first thinking they would soften up. We have washed them .7 times and they feel like sand paper. No way we could ever put them on the bed. We feel your advertising was Very deceptive.!!! Do not waste your money. Worst sheets ever!!

name: Phillip Terry
text: Excellent products and service.

name: Joni Miller
text: Ordered 2 Queen size sheet sets! Wildly different sizing in the flat sheets. One was 100 inches by 98 inches. The other was 104 inches by 88 inches. Called customer service, twice. Was promised a new flat sheet that was never shipped. Finally, just fixed the problem with my sewing machine. The fabric is nice. However, quality control appears to be non-existent and the customer service awful. I like to buy MADE IN AMERICA, but I will pass on this company!

name: Erica Ham
text: We have two king sets of RedLand Cotton sheets, and just splurged on the ticking stripe quilt. The quality is amazing! My husband doesn’t typically care what we put on our bed, but he only likes these sheets now. So we swap them out each week. Wash wear if great, and the sheets feel crisp and we do not get too hot. The quilt has the right amount of weight and we never wake up hot in the summer. These are investment pieces that will last forever. It’s so nice to find quality sheets that are truly American Made and creates jobs in the USA.

name: Steve Merry
text: I was impressed with the quality of the sheets and blankets.

name: JJ
text: Ordered a set of these for my aunt... she LOVES them!!! And she also went on about the gorgeous packaging, which was nice to hear since I had them sent to her directly from the website. Great American company 🇺🇸

name: Luajuana Brasfield
text: I am very dissatisfied with the feel of the fabric. The sheets are very rough and are not getting softer as advertised. I would never have purchased them if I had thought they would feel so rough. They are very expensive and I cannot use them.

name: Rhonda Moore
text: We have both the sheets and towels. I like the sheets, but the towels bunched up at the decorative stitching, so they look horrible, and they aren’t soft at all. I’m really disappointed in them, especially for the incredibly high price for two sets (over $200!). Sad thing is, the directions say to wash before using, but now that they’ve been washed, they can’t be returned!

name: Britt Sanford
text: Great set of sheets! I purchased the ticking striped set, and it did not disappoint. They kept cooler than we were expecting. Some may not like the stiffness but just know after every wash they will get softer and softer. As a child all my grandparents had 100% cotton sheets. You cannot find true ones in stores anymore it seems. This was exactly what I was looking for. Will definitely give this company my money again one day. And best part they are made right here in Alabama.

name: Anne Kerr
text: I was sad that my flat sheet had tiny tan spots on it.  I thought they would come out in the wash, but they did not.  I expected higher quality.  Would you recommend bleaching it?

name: mikabu47
text:
I recently purchased a set of Ticking Stripe sheets from Red Land. I have been hesitating because many reviews say their sheets are rough, coarse, even scratchy. After investigating these reviews, I'm guessing that their white sheets are not this way. Again guessing that their Natural sheets have a tendency to be rough and scratchy. Then I saw their Ticking Stripe. Though not particularly attracted to the pattern, I liked those better than plain white.
Then it was the cost that prohibited a purchase. After checking quality sheets from other companies, I learned that quality sheets are just REALLY expensive. LL Bean sells their best egyptian cotton sheets in the size I need for $30 less than Red Land. I went down to their best percale sheets, $50 less. That's significantly lower and I know those sheets would have been great. But Red Land is ALL done in America. From the cotton in the field all the way to the finished sheets, it's done in the US. I am tired of everything coming from China or another country. So I took the plunge and paid the extra money and then hoped i wouldn't be disappointed with rough sheets that would prevent me from getting sleep. Reviewer, I can tell you I am elated with the Ticking Stripe sheets. Would I prefer solid colors or pretty patterns? Yes, but I won't trade these sheets for anything! When I first laid my face on the pillow, I could feel it was somewhat rough. (I washed them first)  But they weren't so rough that I couldn't stand it. I have Fibromyalgia and my whole body is ultra sensitive, especially my skin. I allowed myself to forget about the slight roughness of the pillowcase, my body relaxed and all was well. They are not rough on my bare legs or arms. They have excellent body, but not too stiff. I like a sheet with body, not sheets that are so "soft" that they practically stick to me and my sleep shirt. Blech! Thank you Red Land for truly making sheets that will last the rest of my life and beyond.
I have a 100% latex mattress. Was worried the fitted sheet would be too loose and bunch up. The 14" fit snug and perfect. The top sheet is long enough to fit the full length of my bed but still plenty to tuck in without constantly coming out. Thank you! They are cool, and oh so comfortable. I absolutely love them!

name: Kathleen Moser
text: I can hardly believe how wonderful these sheets are! Reminds me of when I was a child, crawling in my grandma's bed!  It gives me even more pleasure every night when I crawl between them!  We also bought the duvet!  They are pricey, but I won't go back EVER to use anything else for bedding!  Made in America.  America at it's best!

name: Virginia Kilkuskie
text: Great quality.  The sheets are the softest ever and the colors are rich.  Generous cut to the sheets for full and queen beds.

name: Stacie Turberville
text: Best sheets ever!! They remind me of my grandmother’s sheets growing up. Super soft and durable, and a great investment!

name: barbara despain
text:
I wanted to try these sheets after a fb ad.  Big mistake.  The web page says in the top right corner:
Free Returns & Exchanges Always   NOT so.  When I got the sheet I didn't like the feel, very rough/course so I was going to send it right back but on the tag (at the bottom of the sheet) it said: wash before using.  So I thought maybe I needed to wash it before trying it on my bed.  NO WHERE DID IT say on that tag, IF YOU WASH YOU CAN NOT RETURN.  After washing it seemed still quite crude and coarse feeling so I emailed as their page requested for instructions to return.  The agent said: so sorry but if it has been washed you can not return..(basically read the fine print at the bottom of our page).  The ONE sheet cost $90, + shipping.  Frankly I did not want a memory of dealing with this deceptive company so I paid $15 and just sent it back to them.  I could have torn it up for washing windows but then it would have kept reminding me of getting snookered.  These are not the sheets of high quality. If you like the old rough look/feel maybe they are for you but READ the fine print.  I didn't and it cost me over $100.  Glad to be rid of the damn thing tho.  And I should have known, I can't find anywhere on their site to leave a review so they obviously only put good reviews..sure sign not to buy from a  company

name: Clay Collum
text: My wife bought these sheets a month ago and they are perfect. I don’t want anything else on the bed and I’m going to order more right now so we don’t have to use our other sheets when we wash these.

name: Emily Cantrell
text: I grew up traveling thru these cotton fields and was quick to order a queen set after reading reviews.these sheets have a texture that I have not felt even with premium high thread count sheets.Just by holding these up you can feel the weight of this cotton.I noticed I did not get as hot during the night and am sleeping better than I have in a long time. I have laundered twice and put them right back on the bed.

name: Troy S
text: I can't believe how nice this linen is I don't want to get out of bed. Their customer service is the best. I needed to make an exchange to an order and they responded with a call tag for the return that day, no questions asked. I love the fact that they are supporting the American work force. Thanks TNSCAD

name: Dan Smith
text: Absolutely wonderful people who took the time to explain the difference in their product.  By the time you leave, you feel as though you're longtime friends with the staff.  Any excuse to visit this place is a good one!

name: Hannah Pollard
text: Love my sheets!

name: Nancy Barnes
text: Can't evaluate the sheets themselves because as of 05/18/2020, I still have not received them.  I ordered them 05/04/2020, received a notice that they had my order, but that's the last I've heard.

name: Lawson Gary
text: Our Redland sheets, quilts, and towels we received were of the highest quality. The company was a delight to work with. Most importantly, our purchase supports American agriculture, manufacturing, and innovation.

name: Todd Ellison
text: The sheets are very rough, almost like a rough flannel or even a cheap sheet that had started to pill.  The first time we tried to sleep on them we got up and changed the sheets because they were so uncomfortable.  We've washed them multiple I'm times and even tried ironing them to reduce the roughness.  I don't recommend them at all.

name: Lenda Sawyer
text: Everyone friendly and very helpful.

name: Jack Corbett
text: Love these sheets.  The sheet sizes are generously cut and fit perfectly.

name: Julie Pitts
text: An amazing place to get real cotton products you can count on. This is not the extremely thin cotton from markets overseas this is real cotton and the products are amazing!

name: Derek Hinkle
text: Quality, customer care, outstanding products...Made in the USA. Their products are worth every penny. Proud to support American workers, products, and companies!

name: Candace Lard
text: Very nice and very knowledged in the products they sell. Recommed!!!

name: Jeffrey Holt
text: Love this place. GREAT quality and such helpful lady working there. Would recommend to anyone.

name: Teresa Mitchell
text: Love these sheets! Very helpful in the store!

name: Scotty Winter
text: Love their towels and sheets!

name: Tim Elliott
text: Good

name: Steve Garner
text: Unique offerings

name: I.wont. zip.it2021
text: Love this store! Always priced good and constantly rotating clearance items. If your looking for a unique gift or a new piece for your home this is definitely a shop to stop by. Friendly staff, store is clean and pleasant to shop in. Highly recommend this place.

name: Heaven Bound
text: I enjoy looking around at the unique Italian food items especially that have arrived. One dear lady, Sheila, is very knowledgeable about the products, she helped me plan two meals and shared a couple recipe suggestions too. I respect that she never pushes anyone, only provides as much assistance as a shopper wants. The store is neet and clean.

name: Samuel E DiPiazza, SR
text: Lots of nice gifts. Name brands at good prices. Bought most of our Christmas gifts.

name: Tanisha Foster
text: Not a location that I will shop again. I felt completely invisible in this store. The store representatives walked around and didn't say a word.  No greeting when I came in, no acknowledgment as I walked around... No nothing. Oh well, there is another location on 72 in Huntsville.   If Customer service is not your thing, look for something else to do...

name: Dee Alexandria
text: Sheleesa, Megan, and Shaina are so warm, caring, and delightful. The items are priced well.

name: Judy Fortune
text: Has some very nice home decor items.

name: Deborah S Epperson
text:
I've always shopped at Tuesday mornings. They closed my store. Was nice to find one. They have something for everyone there.
Fancy items at great prices. A must see if you haven't been there.

name: Marilyn Warner
text: Great place to buy lamps

name: Kathy Gifford
text: Always a fun place to shop! ❤

name: Gamma Grandma
text: I love this place, you can spend 5 minutes or an hour and nobody is hurrying you or pushing you to buy anything. Great place to find what you need for your home, a gift, or hobby. Great Customer Service.

name: Vianca
text: One of my favorite TMs.  The store is always neat and organized.

name: Richard McLaury
text:
I have not been there since Christmas  but today I was impressed by everyone wearing masks, shoppers and employees. I found 3 items I needed, aisles marked  for 1 way ,plus 6 ft. Remainders every aisle
I wish more grocery stores patrons and employees would use masks.

name: Vani Way
text:
Good stuff. Always out of stock.
A little pricey

name: kathy fitzgerald
text: Bought some yarn for a project at a local Tuesday Mornings n Huntsville. It called for three skeins. I needed more.  Went to checking around and couldn’t find it. One last check at the store on County Line Road. 😕 Was asked when I was leaving did I find everything? When I told them what my problem was she gave me info on product locater. I have tried everyday with no luck. Today it is telling me they have the yarn I am looking for!!! 🙂 Now to complete my project. Thank you Tuesday Mornings in Madison, Alabama on County Line Road.

name: Sue
text: Always helpful staff

name: Vic Robertson
text: Their small food section is my favorite part of the store. I love their German mustards, the gourmet peanuts, the olive oils, and the preserves. There's more that I can't think of at the moment. All of these delicious things are at very low prices.

name: shane Gadomski
text: Everyone was very friendly!

name: Amanda D
text: Tuesday Morning is always a hidden treasure to me. I'm always pleasantly surprised by the amount of home decor and varriety of products they sell at a discount!

name: Lee-Anne Hooks
text: Lots of beautiful stuff!

name: Alisha Black
text: Nice stuff. Moderate prices. Good service.

name: Kim Tannehill
text: Staff is nice and I love finding fun things for my house or friends that I can't just buy anywhere.

name: Kathren York
text: We'll organized and very fun stock!

name: lil code13
text: I just recently went in Tuesday morning and I immediately fell in love with this store it has wonderful gifts and I love everything about it

name: Juanita Washington
text: Everytime I stop in this shop i spend and hour or more shop is clean staff is wonderful. Awesome finds.

name: Yousra Fouani
text: They are happy to take your money but are very rude when return time comes around.

name: Kathryn Justice
text: $300 pot for less than $100

name: Cindy Yeary
text: friendly folks!  store is neat and clean.

name: cynthia homer
text: Nice place for bargains.

name: Andre P Stone
text: Great prices

name: Mel Pedersen
text: Hit and miss

name: Julie Pleinis
text: Always finding treasures

name: sarah lustig
text: Wonderful shopping at affordable prices

name: Jimmy McMurry
text: Average junk store

name: Debbie Dailey
text: Great bargains

name: Hector Murrieta
text:
(Translated by Google) Good shop with household items

(Original)
Buena tienda con articulos para el hogar

name: carmen velez
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good prices, service and kindness

(Original)
Muy buenos precios, servicio y amabilidad

name: Tina Crim
text:
(Translated by Google) More like a meets store

(Original)
More like a treft store
